content: If any of you have kids or grand-kids who would enjoy playing cards with someone they're social distancing from, here's a cool (and free and as far as I can tell, ad-free) website that lets you play cards with someone remotely. It's super simple. Has some built-in games like Go Fish, Checkers & Crazy Eights, but you can also play an arbitrary game that makes use of card decks. (No chips though unless you use checkers...) http://playingcards.io/
I've got my little ones set up to play with grand parents
